items.content_html: Lightweight coding agent that runs in your terminal

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

items.content_html: A modern, lightweight, web-based iPerf3 GUI built with Python 3 and Flask. Run speed tests from any device — macOS, Linux, Windows, or mobile.
items.title: shenknox/iperf3-webui: A modern, lightweight, web-based iPerf3 GUI built with Python 3 and Flask. Run speed tests from any device — macOS, Linux, Windows, or mobile.

items.content_html: Open Source digital loyalty program and lightweight CRM platform for PyMEs/SMEs. Features points, tiers, rewards, QR validation, and customer management. Built with React, Node.js, PostgreSQL.
items.title: omarnasr98/LoyalPyME: Open Source digital loyalty program and lightweight CRM platform for PyMEs/SMEs. Features points, tiers, rewards, QR validation, and customer management. Built with React, Node.js, PostgreSQL.

items.content_html: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.
items.title: PedroFake02/better-link: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.

items.content_html: A lightweight way to use environment variables in your Cursor MCP server definitions.
items.title: dfhgnh43terg/envmcp: A lightweight way to use environment variables in your Cursor MCP server definitions.

items.content_html: A lightweight, accessible component library providing essential UI building blocks for modern web applications.
items.title: muhammadhamzakhan22/element-essentials: A lightweight, accessible component library providing essential UI building blocks for modern web applications.

items.content_html: ⚡ JavaScript-aware crawler for security researchers and bug bounty hunters. Extract hidden endpoints and internal subdomains through static and semantic analysis of JS files. Lightweight. Fast. Sneaky.
items.title: Johan4954/SubProbe: ⚡ JavaScript-aware crawler for security researchers and bug bounty hunters. Extract hidden endpoints and internal subdomains through static and semantic analysis of JS files. Lightweight. Fast. Sneaky.

items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.
items.title: khyatish14/bottom-sheet-stepper: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.

items.content_html: A lightweight authentication app featuring sign-up and login capabilities, including seamless integration with Google and Facebook accounts. Built with Firebase, it also supports user role management, making it ideal for projects that require secure access control and scalable user authentication.
items.title: sopho1/Authenticator-App-using-Firebase: A lightweight authentication app featuring sign-up and login capabilities, including seamless integration with Google and Facebook accounts. Built with Firebase, it also supports user role management, making it ideal for projects that require secure access control and scalable user authentication.

items.content_html: Lightweight extension for monaco-editor to allow commenting off code.
items.title: jburrow/monaco-editor-code-review: Lightweight extension for monaco-editor to allow commenting off code.

items.content_html: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.
items.title: hany226/vibe-coding-starter-pack-3d-multiplayer: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.

items.content_html: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.
items.title: ajstyle4u/DivCopy: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.

items.content_html: **ProFile Lite** is a lightweight file upload and sharing app where authenticated users can upload files and share them via simple, secure links. This project is part of a learning stream to explore and implement modern web technologies in a hands-on way.
items.title: AymenSakouhi/proFile: **ProFile Lite** is a lightweight file upload and sharing app where authenticated users can upload files and share them via simple, secure links. This project is part of a learning stream to explore and implement modern web technologies in a hands-on way.

items.content_html: Lightweight Japanese study tool designed for beginners. Built with React, the app provides a simple, intuitive interface to test recognition skills.
items.title: NguyenHChinh/kanagana: Lightweight Japanese study tool designed for beginners. Built with React, the app provides a simple, intuitive interface to test recognition skills.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
